login_tutorial.email_description: This is where you type the email address you used to create your account. Your email is like your digital name that helps us recognize you.
login_tutorial.password_description: Type your secret password here. The password keeps your account safe. Tap the eye icon üëÅÔ∏è to show or hide your password while typing.
login_tutorial.login_description: After entering your email and password, tap this blue button to enter your account.
login_tutorial.signup_description: If you don't have an account yet, tap here to create one. It's free and only takes a few minutes to get started with learning

signup_tutorial.name_description: Type your full name here exactly as you want it to appear in your account. This helps personalize your learning experience.
signup_tutorial.email_description: Enter your email address here. Make sure it's an email you can access, as we may send important information to this address.
signup_tutorial.password_description: Create a strong password that you can remember. For safety, your password will appear as dots ‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢. Tap the eye icon üëÅÔ∏è if you want to see what you're typing.
signup_tutorial.dob_description: Tap here to select your date of birth. This helps us provide age-appropriate content and keep your account secure.
signup_tutorial.gender_description: Choose your gender from the options. This information helps us better understand our community's needs.
signup_tutorial.signup_description: When you've filled all the information, tap this blue button to create your account and start learning!
signup_tutorial.login_description: If you already have an account, tap here to go back to the login page and access your account.

qr_tutorial.landing_description: Tap this button to scan any QR code and make instant payments at shops and restaurants.
qr_tutorial.qr_scanning1_description: This is what a QR code looks like.
qr_tutorial.qr_scanning2_description: You can upload a QR code from your mobile's photos by clicking this button.
qr_tutorial.qr_scanning3_description: You can scan the QR code by pointing your camera to the QR code image provided by the receiver. Make sure the QR code shows up on the screen of your phone.
qr_tutorial.qr_scanning4_description: For now if you do not have a QR code to scan, click on next to go to the next step.
qr_tutorial.enter_amount1_description: This is the Account name of the person you are sending money to. Make sure the name of the person you actually are intending to send shows up.
qr_tutorial.enter_amount2_description: Enter the amount you want to send to the recipient. Make sure to enter the correct amount.
qr_tutorial.enter_amount3_description: Once you've entered the amount, click this button to proceed to the payment confirmation screen.
qr_tutorial.enter_amount3_actionText: Click on Proceed to Pay button to continue
qr_tutorial.enter_amount4_description: Review the payment details including the total amount and the bank account that will be used for the payment.
qr_tutorial.enter_amount5_description: Click the Pay button to complete your payment. You'll be asked to enter your PIN for security.
qr_tutorial.enter_amount5_actionText: Click on Pay button to continue
qr_tutorial.enter_pin1_description: Double-check the recipient name and amount before proceeding. Make sure everything is correct.
qr_tutorial.enter_pin2_description: Your UPI PIN is a secure password for authorizing payments. Never share your UPI PIN with anyone even your friends or officials. Bank officials will never ask for your PIN either.
qr_tutorial.enter_pin3_description: Enter your carefully as you have limited attempts. As you enter, the dashes will change to dots representing an entered digit.
qr_tutorial.enter_pin4_description: This is an encrypted keyboard that you have to use to enter your secret PIN.
qr_tutorial.enter_pin5_description: Once you have entered the PIN click on check mark to send money.
qr_tutorial.enter_pin5_actiontext: Click on the check mark to continue

mobile_tutorial.landing_description: Tap the ‚ÄúTo Mobile Number‚Äù option under the Money Transfers section to begin sending money using the recipient‚Äôs mobile number.
mobile_tutorial.landing_actiontext: Tap on 'To Mobile Number' to continue
mobile_tutorial.sendMoney1_description: Here you can see the list of people you‚Äôve recently sent or received money from. It helps you quickly repeat a payment without searching again.
mobile_tutorial.sendMoney2_description: Use the search bar to find any contact by name. This is helpful when the list is long or when you want to send money to someone specific.
mobile_tutorial.sendMoney3_description: If the person is not saved in your contacts, simply type their mobile number here. Their UPI ID will automatically appear if it‚Äôs linked.
mobile_tutorial.sendMoney4_description: Type ‚ÄòVivek‚Äô in the search bar to filter and locate his contact quickly.
mobile_tutorial.sendMoney5_description: Tap on Vivek‚Äôs contact to view your payment history and begin a new transaction.
mobile_tutorial.sendMoney5_actionText: Tap on Vivek‚Äôs contact to continue
mobile_tutorial.enter_amount1_description: Before sending money, always confirm that you're on the correct chat. Check the name and mobile number shown in the header to ensure you're paying the right person.
mobile_tutorial.enter_amount2_description: These purple cards represent the payments you have sent to this person. Each card shows the amount, status, and time of the payment.
mobile_tutorial.enter_amount3_description: Black cards represent money you have received from this person. This helps you track your overall transaction history clearly.
mobile_tutorial.enter_amount4_description: Use this text box at the bottom to type any amount or send a message. When you enter a valid amount, the Pay button will appear.
mobile_tutorial.enter_amount5_description: Type the amount 120 in the input box to proceed with the walkthrough.
mobile_tutorial.enter_amount6_description: Tap the Pay button to continue to the final payment confirmation screen.
mobile_tutorial.enter_amount6_actionText: Press the Pay button to continue
mobile_tutorial.enter_pin1_description: Double-check the recipient name and amount before proceeding. Make sure everything is correct.
mobile_tutorial.enter_pin2_description: Your UPI PIN is a secure password for authorizing payments. Never share your UPI PIN with anyone even your friends or officials. Bank officials will never ask for your PIN either.
mobile_tutorial.enter_pin3_description: Enter your carefully as you have limited attempts. As you enter, the dashes will change to dots representing an entered digit.
mobile_tutorial.enter_pin4_description: This is an encrypted keyboard that you have to use to enter your secret PIN.
mobile_tutorial.enter_pin5_description: Once you have entered the PIN click on check mark to send money.
mobile_tutorial.enter_pin5_actiontext: Click on the check mark to continue

bank_tutorial.landing_description: Transfer money directly to any bank account or between your own accounts instantly using Account Number & IFSC.
bank_tutorial.account_details1_description: This shows the bank you selected. You can tap the edit icon to change the bank if needed.
bank_tutorial.account_details2_description: Enter the recipient's bank account number. For this tutorial, enter: 12345678901234
bank_tutorial.account_details3_description: Enter the 11-character IFSC code of the recipient's bank branch. For this tutorial, enter: DLXB0000258
bank_tutorial.account_details4_description: Now click the NEXT button to verify the account holder's name. This ensures you're sending money to the right person.
bank_tutorial.account_details4_actionText: Click Next to verify account details
bank_tutorial.account_details5_description: The account holder's name has been verified. Always confirm this matches the person you intend to send money to.
bank_tutorial.account_details6_description: You can add a nickname for this account to easily identify it later. This is optional but helpful for frequent transfers.
bank_tutorial.account_details7_description: All set! Click 'PROCEED TO PAY' to continue to the payment screen where you'll enter the amount to transfer.
bank_tutorial.account_details7_actionText: Click on Proceed to Pay to continue
bank_tutorial.add_beneficiary1_description: Click here to add a beneficiary's bank account details. You'll need their Account Number and IFSC code to proceed. Once saved, you can quickly transfer money to this account anytime without re-entering details.
bank_tutorial.add_beneficiary1_actionText: Click on icon to add account
bank_tutorial.choose_service1_title: Transfer to Your Own Bank Account
bank_tutorial.choose_service1_description: Quickly move funds between your own linked bank accounts. This option is perfect for managing money across your different banks instantly and securely.
bank_tutorial.choose_service2_title: Send Money to Any Bank Account
bank_tutorial.choose_service2_description: Transfer money to anyone in India using their Account Number & IFSC code. Now let's try sending money to a bank account by clicking this option.
bank_tutorial.choose_service2_actionText: Click on 'To Account Number & IFSC' to continue
bank_tutorial.enter_amount1_description: This header shows who you're sending money to. Verify the recipient's name and bank details before proceeding.
bank_tutorial.enter_amount2_description: Enter the amount you want to transfer. For this tutorial, enter: ‚Çπ 100
bank_tutorial.enter_amount3_description: This shows which account will be used for the payment. You can tap to change the payment source if you have multiple accounts linked.
bank_tutorial.enter_amount4_description: Tap the PAY button to proceed. You'll be asked to enter your UPI PIN on the next screen to authorize the transaction.
bank_tutorial.enter_pin1_description: Double-check the recipient name and amount before proceeding. Make sure everything is correct.
bank_tutorial.enter_pin2_description: Your UPI PIN is a secure password for authorizing payments. Never share your UPI PIN with anyone even your friends or officials. Bank officials will never ask for your PIN either.
bank_tutorial.enter_pin3_description: Enter your carefully as you have limited attempts. As you enter, the dashes will change to dots representing an entered digit.
bank_tutorial.enter_pin4_description: This is an encrypted keyboard that you have to use to enter your secret PIN.
bank_tutorial.enter_pin5_description: Once you have entered the PIN click on check mark to send money.
bank_tutorial.enter_pin5_actiontext: Click on the check mark to continue
bank_tutorial.select_bank1_description: Choose the bank where the receiver holds their account. You can select from popular banks below or use the search bar to find any bank quickly.
bank_tutorial.select_bank2_description: Type the name of the bank in the search bar. Try typing 'Dhanlaxmi Bank' as an example.
bank_tutorial.select_bank3_description: Great! Now tap on 'Dhanlaxmi Bank' from the search results to proceed with adding account details.
